snippet.title: POPGOES Arcade: Fighting Chance Update (FULL REVEAL)
snippet.description:
Be ready for Fighting Chance: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986840/POPGOES_Arcade/

"Fighting Chance" is an upcoming FREE major update for POPGOES Arcade on Steam. My final attempt at perfecting the original vision for the game, giving those who enjoyed the game a reason to play it again, and those who didn't enjoy it a reason to give it another try.

This update is still in development but should be releasing fairly soon.

Also wishlist myPOPGOES: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2429350/myPOPGOES/
